review.title: “Proceed With Caution”
review.pros: Pros – Good pay, work environment, benefits (paid medical anyway); If you work hard and stay you can make some good money;
review.cons: Cons – Cliquey - if you're not in the clique, you're out; Very political, conservative, good ol boy..
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend – I'm optimistic about the outlook for this company
